name: Donald Ira CROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Crooks v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Donald Ira CROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of May, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
The Application for Correction of the Original Record is DENIED.
The Petition for Permission to file Supplemental Brief/Petition is DENIED.
The Application to Expedite is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
897 A.2d 1181
Donald Ira CROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 24, 2006.
